postContent: Continuity Software is looking for a Professional Services Engineer Description: • A Solution Specialist responsible for technical account management and for providing post-sales services such as deployment, integration and training • Manage Proof-of-Concept activities as part of the sales cycle • Work with large international enterprises Required: • Experience in providing hands-on technical services for a datacenter Software solution (1 year +) • Experience in working with customers abroad (1 year +) • Proven project, process and people management skills • HA/DR, Unix System, Storage Management or in-depth virtualization background • Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills • Willingness to travel abroad frequently • Fluent in English Location: Tel Aviv. Please send CV to: TaliA@continuitysoftware.com
